Key Match Events: Devin Booker had a rusty game shooting from the field, shooting only 4-20 from the field, but showed his playmaking, dishing out a game-high nine assists
Pre-Game Insights: Mike Budenholzer mentioned how Booker's rehab was on schedule with what they felt was necessary
Post-Match Reflections: Budenholzer explained how Booker's playmaking is exceptional and a pivotal element of the offense
Booker expressed gratitude to the crowd before getting started
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bradley Beal was ruled out of the Suns game due to a left hip contusion
The injury bug continues to bite, no matter the circumstance
Others: The Suns gave their guard Devin Booker a “game-time decision” label, he ended up playing in the game
The game was a 117-112 loss to the Memphis Grizzlies
